wikipedia_page.main: Timothy Stewart Smith (born 29 December 1953) is an English cricketer. Smith is a right-handed batsman who bowls slow left-arm orthodox. He was born at Henham, Essex and later educated at Bishop's Stortford College in Hertfordshire.

response: Current notable residents include comedian Ed Byrne and actor John Savident. Hertfordshire, Minor Counties and Cambridgeshire cricketer Timothy Smith was born in the village.
*Timothy Smith (New Hampshire politician) (born 1980), New Hampshire House of Representatives politician
